text: Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo yiding yao jie naxie jixiang er tisheng ta, dan ta yilian chenshi, shuncong siyu, suoyi ta xiang gou yiyang, ni he chi ta, ta jiu shen chu shetou lai, ni bu he chi ta, ta ye shen chu shetou lai, zhe shi fouren wo de jixiang zhe de piyu. Ni yao jiangshu zhege ren de gushi, yibian tamen xingwu.
